name: THC - Alien Abduction
detailed_description:
Adds alternative story segment featuring an alien abduction.

Includes over 100 new story pages and 7 new CGs (high quality renders) which are added seamlessly into the story. The player can restart from beginning to ensure the new segment is accessed.
